# Thanks for installing the miniOrange ASP.NET SAML SSO Enterprise library.
This library will help you with integrating SAML SSO (login) for your ASP.NET framework and ASP.NET Core ( MVC, Webforms, Web API) web applications.

#####  For ASP.NET Framework (.NET Framework v4.5.2 - v4.8.2) #####

You can follow the below instructions to configure the SAML SSO in your ASP.NET web application!

1. This library provides you with a user dashboard for configurations. You can open this admin dashboard using the given URL : https://<your-application-base-url>/?ssoaction=config.
e.g. https://localhost:#port#/?ssoaction=config, https://example.com?ssoaction=config

2. To complete the remaining configurations, the below guide will be helpful for you: 
   https://plugins.miniorange.com/asp-net-saml-sso-setup-guides


#####  For ASP.NET Core (.NET Core 3.1, .NET 5- .NET 8) #####
  To set up SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) in your ASP.NET Core Web Application, follow these steps:

1. After installing the required package, you need to add the necessary services and middleware in your Program/Startup.cs file. 
   # For .Net Core 3.1 and .Net5 you need to add services and middleware in Startup.cs
   # For .Net6 - .Net8 you need to add services and middleware in Program.cs

You can find detailed setup instructions by following this link: https://plugins.miniorange.com/asp-net-core-saml-sso-setup-guides

2. Additionally, this library provides a user dashboard for configurations. You can access this admin dashboard using the given URL: `https://<your-application-base-url>/?ssoaction=config`. 
   e.g. https://localhost:#port#/?ssoaction=config, https://example.com?ssoaction=config
 
   
Make sure to replace `<your-application-base-url>` with the actual base URL of your application. This dashboard will allow you to configure various aspects of the SSO integration.
 
3. You will be asked to activate the licnese for the first time, please follow the added link for the steps to activate the license: https://faq.miniorange.com/knowledgebase/license-activation-steps-for-miniorange-asp-net-saml-sso-plugins/
